mission_data.mission_description: Mission: The Ackbar Principle^This is a mission for one carrier with a full complement of fighters, and makes heavy use of Comms. It uses the TSN Mod and was written for Artemis 2.7.1. Completion of the Gerrard mission and an experienced Comms player recommended.^^Coming off of a bruising victory near Gerrard Base, the Artemis Carrier is directed to rest in the backwater Rialta system...until a computer virus flips everything on its head.

set_ship_text.name: Nuremburg
set_ship_text.hailtext: Boxes. Lots, and lots, of boxes. Yep.

warning_popup_message.message: Confirmation Required! Enter code Alpha, Bravo, Charlie, Delta

event.name: Nuke Ejection Confirmed
event.incoming_comms_text: Confirmed, Bridge! ^Disarming and jettisoning nuclear warheads.

event.name: Nuke Eject Complete Generic Mesh
event.incoming_comms_text: All nuclear material has been jettisoned, Bridge.^We won't be able to reload without shutting down for repairs.

warning_popup_message.message: Confirmation Required! Enter code Alpha, Bravo, Charlie, Delta

event.name: EMP Ejection Confirmed
event.incoming_comms_text: Confirmed, Bridge!^Disarming and jettisoning EMP warheads.

event.name: EMP Eject Complete Generic Mesh
event.incoming_comms_text: Our EMP system has been jettisoned, Bridge.^We won't be able to reload without shutting down for repairs.

warning_popup_message.message: Confirmation Required! Enter code Alpha, Bravo, Charlie, Delta

event.name: Warp Ejection Confirmed
event.incoming_comms_text: Confirmed, Bridge!^Disarming and jettisoning the warp core.

event.name: Warp Eject Complete
event.incoming_comms_text: Our Warp core has been jettisoned, Bridge.^^We won't be able to achieve warp speeds without extensive repairs.

event.name: Shutdown Instructions
event.incoming_comms_text: Unable to comply. To initiate shutdown procedure:^^--Weapons: Lower shields^--Helm: Reduce speed to 0^--Engineering: Set all power to 0%^--Comms: Press "Initiate Shutdown"
event.warning_popup_message: Unable to comply. To initiate shutdown procedure:^^--Weapons: Lower shields^--Helm: Reduce speed to 0^--Engineering: Set all power to 0%^--Comms: Press "Initiate Shutdown"

warning_popup_message.message: Red Squadron Low on Fuel returning to refuel

set_ship_text.name: Mission Shuttle
set_ship_text.hailtext: The equipment is set up and ready to deploy.

set_ship_text.name: Mission Shuttle
set_ship_text.hailtext: Ready to deliver supplies. What's the destination?

event.name: Swap Launch and Recall Shuttle Buttons
Tractor Ready
event.incoming_comms_text: Beam Ready. To Use:^^Helm: Move to within 220m of target^Weapons: *disable Auto Beams*^Weapons: Target object^Helm: Adjust course to move away from object; maintain impulse power^Comms: Press Tractor Beam to activate and disable

event.name: Ship Hail Creation

event.incoming_comms_text: Diagnostics Instructions:^Redirect dummy ship to defend Diagnostics Test Beacon 1.
event.warning_popup_message: Diagnostics Instructions:^Redirect dummy ship to rendezvous with Diagnostics Beacon 1.

event.incoming_comms_text: Weapon Diagnostics Partial Results^Code Segment Alpha: |codeA|

event.incoming_comms_text: Weapon Diagnostics Partial Results^Code Segment Bravo: |codeB|

event.name: Targeting 4.5
event.incoming_comms_text: Weapon Diagnostics Partial Results^Code Segment Delta: |codeD|

event.name: System Greeting
event.incoming_comms_text: Greetings, this is Rialta 4. ^We understand you've seen some heavy action lately. Come on in to dock, and we'll get you all set up with some drinks. Everyone around here is dying to hear some good stories. Not much to see around here, except the nebula.^^Welcome to our little backwater sector!

event.name: Message from Base
event.incoming_comms_text: This is Rialta 4 again. You sure are bringing some excitement.^^We just received an encoded message from central command, marked as highest priority and directed to you.^^Transmitting it now.

disabled_event.name: Message from Base TEST
disabled_event.incoming_comms_text: Artemis, this is Rialta 4 again. You sure are bringing some excitment.^^We just received an encoded message from central command, marked as highest priority and directed to you.^^Transmitting it now.

event.name: Encrypted message recieved from base
event.warning_popup_message: Artemis, this is Rialta 4 again. You sure are bringning some excitment.^^We just received an encoded message from central command, marked as highest priority and directed to you.^^Transmitting it now.

event.name: Decrypted message 1
event.incoming_comms_text: Urgent:^^The Starship Ackbar will be entering your sector shortly, in quadrant B1.^^You are to rendezvous with it and provide escort to Rialta 4.^^It is imperative that the ship arrive safely at the starbase.^^Proceed immediately to quadrant B2 and await the Ackbar's arrival.

set_ship_text.name: Akbar
set_ship_text.hailtext: This is the, uh, Akbar. We're all fine, over here. How are you?

event.name: Trap Message
event.incoming_comms_text: This is the Akbar. We have an urgent, message for you from Space Commandd. ^^An escort is following us, but our systems were badly damaged in an attack; approach to visual range at impulse speed. We will transmitt of our message at 7000m.^^Decrypt the message immediately upon receipt, this is a time sensitive matter.^^Akbar out.

event.name: IFF Warning
event.warning_popup_message: IFF Signature for SS Akbar is out of date!^ Suggest Targeting Ship Immediately!
event.incoming_comms_text: IFF Signature for SS Akbar is out of date!^^Raise shields and target ship immediately!

event.name: Trap Sprung
event.incoming_comms_text: Message transmitted. Halt advance and decrypt immediately!

event.name: Akbar Revealed
event.incoming_comms_text: Let us see how you liked our message!

set_ship_text.name: Akbar
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Numerous upgrades, highly dangerous. Scanners scrambled.
set_ship_text.hailtext: Familiar with iocaine powder? No? I'll send some over; tell your Captain it's fantastic in mulled wine.

event.name: Real Ackbar and Escort Ships Arrive

warning_popup_message.message: Sensor Note: Nuke Unit retrieved by Akbar

log.text: Nuclear Unit collected by Pirate Ship Akbar (Revenge)

event.name: Pirates Pick Up Nuke Unit Revenge

warning_popup_message.message: Sensor Note: Nuke Unit moved onboard Revenge

log.text: Nuclear Unit collected by Pirate Ship Akbar (Revenge)
Pirate Ship Akbar (Revenge) has escaped with nuclear weapons.
Pirate Ship Akbar (Revenge) has escaped with nuclear weapons.

event.name: Request Beacon Scanning
event.incoming_comms_text: Station sensors are detecting three unknown objects in the system.^However, with all the new interference we can't get a good read on them.^Please investigate!

set_ship_text.name: Beacon 1
set_ship_text.desc: High-power equipment array. Configuration not recognized.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Unknown technology detected. Military grade disruption.

set_ship_text.name: Beacon 2
set_ship_text.desc: High-power equipment array. Configuration not recognized.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Unknown technology detected. Military grade disruption.

set_ship_text.name: Beacon 3
set_ship_text.desc: High-power equipment array. Configuration not recognized.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Unknown technology detected. Military grade disruption.

event.name: Request Beacon Retrieval
event.incoming_comms_text: We need you to retrieve one of those enemy beacons for us to study.^You can destroy the other two.^Use your tractor beam to move the beacon within 500 meters of the station Pinstaid; we'll take it from there.^^Thanks!

event.name: Beacons Collected
event.incoming_comms_text: That'll do it!^These things are totally new to us, but they seem to be some sort of navigational or communications relay.^^Hopefully we can figure them out before whoever made them comes back...^^You can bring more in, or destroy them. It's up to you.

event.name: Beacons Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: Station sensors indicate all of the enemy beacons were destroyed.^^We'll have to analyze the wreckage.^^Clean up any enemy hostiles in the area. It's a good thing you were here!

event.name: Reset Moonstar
event.incoming_comms_text: Thank the stars it's you! What the heck is going on around here?^^Our communications signals are all scrambled, and we can't tell friend from foe. We are resetting our equipment now to match yours. We'll follow your commands, but don't have any weapons.^^

event.name: Brachiator Reset
event.incoming_comms_text: Good to see a friendly face!^^Everything went all haywire, and I suddenly couldn't tell friend from foe. ^^I've reset everything to tie in with your sensors and will follow your commands. Just give me a target to shoot at!

event.name: Reset Epistolic
event.incoming_comms_text: This is the Epistolic. Thanks for helping us clear out that virus. ^^We're glad to see you are still afloat, and will tie our sensors in with yours now.

event.name: Reset Pontrelle
event.incoming_comms_text: Pontrelle, 'ere. Got you on visual. ^^We're on your side--let us know wha' to do. Got some nice weapons on this scout ship.

event.name: Reset Fairy Party
event.incoming_comms_text: Mayday, mayday! We've lost all of our sensor and navigation data.^^We can't tell who our enemies are! Please help!

event.name: Reset Antelope
event.incoming_comms_text: This is the Antelope. ^We're unarmed, and carrying civilians. That virus wiped out our sensors and comms systems--thanks for restablishing contact.

event.name: Reset Admantine
event.incoming_comms_text: USFP Admantine to Allied Ships--^Communications and ID re-established.^Not sure who these fellows are, but it's time for payback! Let's get this system under control!

event.name: Reset Fleur
event.incoming_comms_text: Wait... I think I see....^Is that--It's that visiting carrier! They punched through the static!^Give us someone to defend! We're an armed escort ship!

event.name: Reset AckbarTrue
event.incoming_comms_text: All ships!^This is the Ackbar! It's a trap! We need to get to the stations and find out what's going on!

event.name: IFF Answer
event.incoming_comms_text: static*--^..tion re-established! ... do you hear us? This is Rialta 4 Control! We have visual confirmation and have re-connected our systems.^^We have no offensive abilities. Please defend us!^^The Pinstaid was captured by enemy troops and we lost contact. You'll need to send in some Marines, if you haven't already.

set_ship_text.name: Pinstaid
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Recently reclaimed station with upgraded defenses.
set_ship_text.hailtext: Thank you! We are back in control of the station.

set_ship_text.name: Pinstaid
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Recently reclaimed station with upgraded defenses.
set_ship_text.hailtext: Thank you! We are back in control of the station.

event.name: Virus Activated
event.incoming_comms_text: This is the Admiral.^^The Ackbar is being accompanied by a peace delegation of several races. It has come under heavy fire from false-flag ships masquerading as Space Navy vessels.^^You are to protect the Ackbar at all costs, and destroy any pursuing enemy ships.

event.name: Virus Proximity Activated
event.incoming_comms_text: This is the Admiral.^^The Ackbar is being accompanied by a peace delegation of several races. It has come under heavy fire from false-flag ships masquerading as Space Navy vessels.^^You are to protect the Ackbar at all costs, and destroy any pursuing enemy ships.

event.name: Virus Detected Engineering 4 systems
event.incoming_comms_text: Engineering Diagnostics Result: Virus detected.^Isolation code: |codeA| |codeB| |codeC| |codeD|

event.name: Virus Detected Weapons
event.incoming_comms_text: Weapons Diagnostics Result: Virus Detected!^Isolation Code: |codeA| |codeB| |codeC| |codeD|

event.name: Virus Detected Science
event.incoming_comms_text: Science Diagnostics Result: Virus Detected!^Isolation Code: |codeA| |codeB| |codeC| |codeD|

event.name: Virus Detected Helm
event.incoming_comms_text: Helm Diagnostics Result: Virus Detected!^Isolation Code: |codeA| |codeB| |codeC| |codeD|

event.name: Virus Detected Comms
event.incoming_comms_text: Comms Diagnostics Result: Virus Detected!^Isolation Code: |codeA| |codeB| |codeC| |codeD|

event.name: Virus Isolated

warning_popup_message.message: Virus isolated. Initiate shutdown to eliminate.

event.incoming_comms_text: Systems Diagnostics Complete: Virus Isolated^Initiate complete shutdown and restart of all systems to eliminate virus.^^TO INITIATE SHUTDOWN: ^Engineering: Set all power to 0%^Helm: Set throttle to 0^Weapons: Drop shields^Comms: Press "Shutdown"

event.name: Nuclear Missiles Compromised
event.incoming_comms_text: Bridge, the nuclear missiles are beginning a countdown!^^If we don't jettison them immediately, they're going to destroy the ship!

event.name: Virus Extends to Base
event.incoming_comms_text: This is Station Pinstaid---What is going on?^^^All of our systems are going haywire! The entire data vault is being deleted!^^^We're ........ can't read ....... total failu........... ^^^........ re-establish communications through visual ......! ^^^Repeat ......... re-establish.....through....confirmation!^^^*static*

event.name: Create Nebulas and black holes
event.incoming_comms_text: Mayday, mayday! This is the Pinstaid!^We are being boarded by enemy forces! Is anyone out there?^Immediate assistance needed! They're everywhere!^Oh, god, they're----*transmission lost*

set_ship_text.name: Pinstaid
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Occupied by enemy forces. Assualt force required to regain control.
set_ship_text.hailtext: This is the Pinstaid resistance. Our station has been occupied by enemy forces! Please send help!

set_ship_text.name: Unknown Object
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Unknown object! Conduct proximity scan with equipment shuttle.

set_ship_text.name: Unknown Object 2
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Unknown object! Conduct proximity scan with equipment shuttle.

set_ship_text.name: Unknown Object 3
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Unknown object! Conduct proximity scan with equipment shuttle.

event.name: Pirate and Captured Base Fighter Defense Behavior
All Enemies Destroyed and IFF recovered

log.text: Enemies destroyed and IFF resolved, Game Ended

warning_popup_message.message: All enemies destroyed and remaining allies identified
You failed to complete your mission.
